description: A member of the Sand Rat group of bandits who assists Jiron in stealing the Xabungle and later joins him aboard the Iron Gear. Rag doesn`t hold much loyalty to the Iron Gear and has plans to steal it someday. At one point she leaves the Iron Gear and stays with Akon Akag, one of Kid Horla`s subordinates, but returns to it following his death. She later shows a lot of admiration for Katakam as well. She is often in conflict with Elchi.
name: Rag Uralo
